QuestData.Title: Wrath of the Sandfury
QuestData.Description: De Sandfury are a resilient tribe. Dey have survived sandstorms an' years an' years of other tings long covered by da sands. It would be foolish to assume that the only forces here are da trolls. We been tamin' da scarabs, breedin' da sul'lithuz, an' raisin' our dead to keep on fightin' for all eternity as zombies.$B$BRuuzlu, da right hand of Chief Ukorz Sandscalp, be plannin' to use dem to retake Tanaris for de Sandfury empire. You best be killin' da trolls in charge of dis if you want to live, mon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Theka the Martyr, Witch Doctor Zum'rah, Antu'sul, and Ruuzlu.
QuestData.RewardText: You killed dem? All of dem? And you return alive?$B$BTake what you want off my body, den. It's mostly curse-free, Mazoga promises.
